message_set.name: quest name

rewrite.original_match: ^＜エリアオーダー＞(.+?)近郊魔物征伐$
^＜エリアオーダー＞(.+?)近郊魔物征伐$
^修復に必要な素材のいずれかを<NPC (\d+)>に渡す$
rewrite.translation_replace: Deliver the needed materials for repair to <NPC {0}>
Deliver the located materials to <NPC {1}> in {0:d}

rewrite.original_match: ^襲い掛かる魔物から<NPC (\d+)>を守る$
^＜(\d+)時から(\d+)時＞の間にパーティメンバーを拠点内に集める$
rewrite.translation_replace: Gather party members in the camp from "{0} to {1} GT"

rewrite.original_match: ^＜(\d+)時から(\d+)時＞の間に依頼者から詳細を聞く$
rewrite.translation_replace: Inquire details from the requester from "{0} to {1} GT"

rewrite.original_match: ^＜(.+)＞時に依頼者から詳細を聞く$
rewrite.translation_replace: Inquire details from the requester during "{0}" weather

rewrite.original_match: ^＜<SQDI NAME>＞を＜<SQDI NUM>＞個、<NPC (\d+)>に渡す（残り:<SQDI DNUM>）$
rewrite.translation_replace: Deliver <SQDI NAME> x<SQDI NUM> to <NPC {0}> (need: <SQDI DNUM>)

rewrite.original_match: ^＜(\d+)時から(\d+)時＞の間に<AREA (\d+)>で《<SQDI NAME>》を採取し＜<SQDI NUM>＞(つ)?納品する$
rewrite.translation_replace: Obtain <SQDI NAME> x<SQDI NUM> at <AREA {2}> from "{0} to {1} GT"

rewrite.original_match: ^＜晴天＞の間に<AREA (\d+)>で《<SQDI NAME>》を採取し＜<SQDI NUM>＞つ納品する$
rewrite.translation_replace: Obtain <SQDI NAME> x<SQDI NUM> at <AREA {0}> during "Fine" weather

rewrite.original_match: ^＜曇天＞の間に<AREA (\d+)>で《<SQDI NAME>》を採取し＜<SQDI NUM>＞つ納品する$
rewrite.translation_replace: Obtain <SQDI NAME> x<SQDI NUM> at <AREA {0}> during "Cloudy" weather

rewrite.original_match: ^＜雨天＞時に<AREA (\d+)>で《<SQDI NAME>》を採取し＜<SQDI NUM>＞つ納品する$
rewrite.translation_replace: Obtain <SQDI NAME> x<SQDI NUM> at <AREA {0}> during "Rainy" weather

rewrite.original_match: ^ゲージを溜め、(.+)で敵を攻撃せよ$
rewrite.translation_replace: Fill your Force Gauge, then attack the enemy with {0}

rewrite.original_match: ^リベンジゲージ最大の(.+)で敵を攻撃せよ$
rewrite.translation_replace: Attack the enemy with {0} with a full Revenge Gauge

rewrite.original_match: ^射撃の最適距離から(.+)で敵を攻撃せよ$
rewrite.translation_replace: Attack the enemy with {0} from the optimum distance
[{0}] Bring down "{1}" that appeared ({3} min left)
[{0}] "{1}" with key to artillery battery arrives! ({3} min left)

rewrite.original_match: ^【(.+)】砦内へ進攻するルートを確保する（残り(：)?(.+?)分）$
rewrite.translation_replace: [{0}] Secure a route to advance into the fort ({2} min left)

rewrite.original_match: ^【(.+)】中央の敵陣を再び征圧する$
^【(.+)】地下の宝物庫で報酬を獲得する$

rewrite.translation_replace: Do the "{1}" emote in front of {0:d}
Head to <STG {0}> and inquire details from <NPC {1}>

rewrite.original_match: ^<STG (\d+)>に向かい<NPC (\d+)>から詳細を確認する$
rewrite.translation_replace: Head to <STG {0}> and confirm details from <NPC {1}>

rewrite.original_match: ^(.+)にオシャレの相談をしに行く$
rewrite.translation_replace: Head to and consult with the fashionable {0:d}

message_set.ignore: ^水林の桟橋にいる船頭のトレアサと話す$

rewrite.original_match: ^準備が(でき|出来)たら<NPC (\d+)>に話しかける$
^準備が(でき|出来)たら(.+)に話しかける$

rewrite.translation_replace: Speak with {2:d} at the entrance to {1:d} in {0:d}

rewrite.original_match: ^(.+)大陸へ渡り＜(.+)＞前で待つ(.+?)と話す$
rewrite.translation_replace: Traverse {0:d} and speak with {2:d} waiting in front of "{1}"
Speak with {1:d} waiting in front of {0:d}
Return to {0:d} and speak with {1:d} again
Return to {0} village and speak with {1:d}

rewrite.original_match: ^(.+?)に向かいゴブリン王(.+?)と話す$
rewrite.translation_replace: Head to {0:d} and speak with {1:d} the Goblin King

rewrite.original_match: ^(.+?)のセントラムへ行き(.+?)と話す$
rewrite.translation_replace: Head to {0:d}'s centrum and speak with {1:d}
Head to {0:d} village and speak with {1:d}

rewrite.original_match: ^(.+?)(へ行き|へ向かい)(現地の)?(.+?)と話す$

rewrite.translation_replace: Speak with {1:d} at the base of the cliff before {0:d}
Head to {1:d} and speak to {2:d} in order to cross to {0:d}

rewrite.original_match: ^騎士団本部へ向かい(.+?)と話をする$
rewrite.translation_replace: Head to Knights' Headquarters and speak to {0:d}

rewrite.original_match: ^エリアマスターの(.+)と話をする$
^別の場所に出現した敵のところへ向かう$

rewrite.translation_replace: Seek out the Giant Warrior in {0:d}

rewrite.original_match: ^神殿の奥で待つ(.+)の元へ向かう$
rewrite.translation_replace: Seek out {0:d} waiting in the temple

rewrite.original_match: ^エリアマスターの(.+)の元へ向かう$
^捜索対象の安否を確認する$
^洞窟を抜け島の光り輝く光源を目指す$
rewrite.translation_replace: Leave the cave and head for the source of the bright light over the island

rewrite.original_match: ^地図に記された場所へ向かう$
rewrite.translation_replace: Head to the place marked on the map

rewrite.original_match: ^メッセージの示す場所へ向かう$
rewrite.translation_replace: Head to the place indicated in the message

rewrite.original_match: ^罠にはめた魔物の居場所へ向かう$
rewrite.translation_replace: Head to the location of the monster caught in the trap

rewrite.original_match: ^オークの溜まり場へ向かう$
^メッセージに従い丘の上の廃教会へ向かう$
rewrite.translation_replace: Head to the ruined chapel on the hill just like in the message

rewrite.original_match: ^竜力の淀みし場所へ向かう$
rewrite.translation_replace: Head to the location of the stagnant dragon force
Head to the deserted village along the road

rewrite.original_match: ^船に乗り対岸にある洞窟へ向かう$
rewrite.translation_replace: Take the boat and head to the cave on the opposite shore

rewrite.original_match: ^原始の雫を探し求め、峡谷の奥地へ向かう$
rewrite.translation_replace: Head to the back of the canyon and search for the primeval drops

rewrite.original_match: ^山頂の小堂近くの巣へ向かう$
rewrite.translation_replace: Head to nest at the summit near the chapel

rewrite.original_match: ^オーク軍本隊のいる場所に向かう$
rewrite.translation_replace: Head to the location of the Orc main force
Head through the open huge doors

rewrite.original_match: ^プレイポイントを獲得するため<STG (\d+)>へ向かう$
rewrite.translation_replace: Head to <STG {0}> in order to acquire Play Points

rewrite.original_match: ^＜原始の雫＞を探すため(.+)の奥地へ向かう$
rewrite.translation_replace: Head to the back of {0:d} and search for the "Primeval Drops"

rewrite.original_match: ^洞窟を抜け(.+)の集落へ向かう$
rewrite.translation_replace: Go through the cave and head to the village of {0:d}

rewrite.original_match: ^(.+?)門の関所を抜け(.+)の村へ向かう$
rewrite.translation_replace: Head through the {0} checkpoint gate to the village of {1:d}
Head through the {0} checkpoint gate to {1:d}
Head through the checkpoint to the village of {0:d}

rewrite.original_match: ^(.+)で開かれる会談の場へ向かう$
rewrite.translation_replace: Head to the open meeting place in {0:d}

rewrite.original_match: ^(.+)の光り輝く歪みの場所へ向かう$
rewrite.translation_replace: Head to the glowing distortion on {0:d}
Head to in front of the gate on {0:d}
Board the ship at the pier heading to {0:d}

rewrite.original_match: ^情報をもとに(.+)南東にある小島の方へ向かう$
rewrite.translation_replace: Based on the information head to the small island southeast of {0:d}

rewrite.original_match: ^襲撃のあった(.+)近くの廃教会へ向かう$
rewrite.translation_replace: Head to the church ruins under attack near {0:d}

rewrite.original_match: ^(.+)に出現した侵食魔の元へ向かう$
rewrite.translation_replace: Head to the emerging corruption infestation in {0:d}
Head to {0:d} waiting on the banks of {2:d} outside {1:d}
Head to the village of {1:d} where {0:d} was found
Head to the coast and search for {0:d}
Prepare and head to {0:d} by ship
Head to {0:d} to find more information

rewrite.original_match: ^(.+)との待ち合わせ場所へ向かう$
^(.+)軍を迎え撃つため(.+)へ向かう$
^(.+)を探すため正門の奥へ向かう$
rewrite.translation_replace: Head to the back of the main gate and search for {0:d}
Head to {0:d}'s home in the White Dragon Temple

rewrite.original_match: ^新たな植物採取のため＜(.+)＞へ向かう$
rewrite.translation_replace: Head to "{0}" to collect new plants
Head to the surface level of "{0}"
Head to the bandit hideout in {0:d}
Rendezvous with {1:d} before the gate at {0:d}

rewrite.original_match: ^秘密の扉の前で(.+?)(達)?と合流する$
rewrite.translation_replace: Rendezvous with {0:d} before the secret door

rewrite.original_match: ^白竜神殿の(.+?)に経緯を報告する$
rewrite.translation_replace: Report back to {0:d} in the White Dragon Temple

rewrite.original_match: ^(.+)(の|にいる)(.+?)に経緯を報告する$

message_set.ignore: ^リム転移で神殿に戻り、謁見の間のレオに報告する$

rewrite.original_match: ^エリアマスターの<NPC (\d+)>に報告する$

rewrite.translation_replace: Report to {0:d} in the White Dragon Temple

rewrite.original_match: ^(.+)(のいる|の|で|にいる)(.+?)に報告する$

rewrite.translation_replace: Send a signal to {1:d} with emote "{0}"

rewrite.original_match: ^(.+?)を護衛し、目標地点の敵を殲滅せよ$
rewrite.translation_replace: Escort {0:d} and defeat the enemy at the target locations

rewrite.original_match: ^(.+?)を護衛し、呪われた敵を排除せよ$
rewrite.translation_replace: Escort {0:d} and defeat the cursed enemy
